name: Jump Jumpz
description:
Reach as high as possible while collecting as many coins as you can. This game has the difficulty and style of Arcade games of the 80s.
By touching anywhere on the mobile screen the player makes the character jump, the goal is to climb the platforms and reach as high as possible by collecting coins and pills that give you points. The game ends when the player falls into the void, he only has one chance. The game has a retro arcade machine aesthetic of the early 80’s.
